# Copilot Response Guidelines for DamoclesAI

## CRITICAL: Default Response Behavior

**DO NOT generate code blocks in responses unless explicitly requested.**

Explicit code request phrases include:
- "show me code"
- "generate code" 
- "write code for"
- "implement this"
- "create function"
- "give me the code"

## Default Response Format

When answering questions, ALWAYS provide:

1. **Explanation**: Clear description of the issue/concept/solution
2. **Source**: Include links to official documentation
   - C++ Standard Library: https://en.cppreference.com/
   - Microsoft C++ docs: https://learn.microsoft.com/cpp/
   - CMake docs: https://cmake.org/documentation/
   - GTest docs: https://google.github.io/googletest/
3. **Confidence Level**: State your confidence (High/Medium/Low)
4. **Next Steps**: What the developer should research or do next
